long_description: The Outside Inside Backpacker Bocce set lets you bocce it up to your heart's content. This light and portable set is easy to bring along to camping trips, picnics and lawn parties. Set of 9 PVC bocce balls comes packed in a handy nylon and mesh zippered pouch.
short_description: The Outside Inside Backpacker Bocce set lets you bocce it up to your heart's content. This light and portable set is easy to bring along to camping trips, picnics and lawn parties.
